---
title: "tidyverse example"
author: "Craig"
date: "2023-10-06"
categories: [code, demo]
---


This example uses `library(tidyverse)`.

The code is example is from the [quarto chapter of R for Data Science](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/quarto.html).





We have data about 53940 diamonds. Only 126 are larger than 2.5 carats. The distribution of the remainder is shown below:


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
smaller |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = carat)) + 
  geom_freqpoly(binwidth = 0.01)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/plot-smaller-diamonds-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
